{{html:
<div ng-controller="CloudSpaceManagementController">
	<h1>Settings for Cloud Space {[currentAccount.name]} / {[cloudSpace]}</h1>
	<br>
	<tabset style="clear:both;">

		<tab id="access" heading="Access Management">
			<div id="access" class="tab-pane">
}}
			{{include:CloudSpaceAccessManagement}}
{{html:
			</div>
		</tab>
		<tab id="details" heading="Details">
			<div id="details" class="tab-pane active" >
				<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;" class="clearfix">
					<label class="left" style="margin-right: 10px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; min-width: 65px;">Secret API Key:</label>
					<p class="txt-14 txt-gray">{[ cloudSpaceDetails.secret]}</p>
				</div>
				<br/>
				<div ng-switch="currentSpace.location.toLowerCase()" ng-show="currentSpace.location" style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
          			<label class="left" style="margin-right: 10px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; min-width: 65px;">Location:</label>
          			<div class="txt-center" ng-switch-when="ca1" style="float: left; margin-bottom: 20px;">
          				<img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/canada.png">
          				<span style="display: block; margin-top: 5px; font-size: 13px;">Canada</span>
          			</div>
          			<div class="txt-center" ng-switch-when="us1" style="float: left; margin-bottom: 20px;">
          				<img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/usa.png">
          				<span style="display: block; margin-top: 5px; font-size: 13px;">United States</span>
          			</div>
					<div class="txt-center" ng-switch-when="test1" style="float: left; margin-bottom: 20px;">
						<img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/black-flag.png">
						<span style="display: block; margin-top: 5px; font-size: 13px;">Test</span>
					</div>
        		</div>
				<br><button class="btn" ng-click="deleteCloudspace()" style="margin-top: 20px; clear: both; display: block;"><i class="fa fa-trash"></i> Delete Cloud Space</button>
				<script type="text/ng-template" id="deleteCloudSpaceDialog.html">
					<form name="destroyform" ng-submit="cancelDeletion()">
						<div class="modal-header">
								<h3>Delete Cloud Space?</h3>
						</div>
						<div class="modal-body">
								<input type="hidden" value="hiddenmarker" name="hiddencsmarker"/>
								Deleting a Cloud Space is irreversible and <br/>
								all data and authorizations to it will be removed.
						</div>
						<div class="modal-footer">
								<button type="button" class="btn ok" ng-click="ok()">Ok</button>
								<button type="submit" id="canceldelete" class="btn btn-primary" autofocus>Cancel</button>
						</div>
					</form>
				</script>
			</div>
		</tab>
	</tabset>
</div>
}}




{{html:

<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/CloudSpace/CloudSpaceManagementController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
